text: Don t have anyone to talk toBeen alone forever  never a girlfriend or love interest  never one who returned my affections anyway  No friends except two or three high school buddies I see maybe once every couple of years  No money  no career and the future s looking grim   Moved to a college town recently and I constantly feel like I just stepped out of a time machine  In fact I feel just like Doctor Who  I m really old but no one can tell and decades of solitude have made me really smart and really weird   It s becoming obvious that i m not going to be able to make any friends around here even though there are finally people to talk to that I can almost relate to because even thouh I m a textbook loser everybody seems threatened by me  I go to a party and I ll be eventually thrown out because some meathead thinks his girlfriend is in love with me  Which is fucking hilarious  let me tell ya   Thought I made some friends two nights ago but yep  before I knew what was happening I got punched in the face and chased out by   drunk shitheads  I can t even let my guard down around people I know and trust because time and time again they seem to wait for an opportunity to attack me  usually while sleeping  It s getting to be fucking repetitive but I ve accepted ther s something about me that brings that out in people   And none of that seems serious anymore  what worries me is lately all I see are damaged people and starving animals and just needless pain   After that guy decked me I really felt myself going over to the dark side  If I had seen who did it  sucker punch WOP  I think I might have gone back ther and killed him  I can t shake the constant rage and I m starting to worry about myself   Actually after writing this I already feel much better   I m going to be alright  Pardon the spelling  I m typing on a phone  I just wonder how much loneliness a human   can take   Ha ha the captcha is asking if I m human

text: Don t know what to do About   months ago I realized that I really just wasn t that happy with my life and what was going on   I felt worthless  dumb  and just overall useless   About   months ago I started dating this wonderful girl who brought me so much happiness   And about a month after we started dating on a road trip we crashed my car   It was a stupid and dumb decision but the way I see it is that it happened and now there s nothing I can do about it and sulking on that matter won t help at all   I was dating her secretly but then my parents found out when this incident happened and I was banned from seeing her   We have school together however so there isn t to much they can do about that   Anyway  after that event life just got harder again and I realized how bad of a mental state I really am in   Nothing really brings me joy now except for her and I can t see her   of the time   It feels so hard just to keep myself breathing let alone go from a day to day basis   I feel like if she is gone I will have no problem ending it cause the thought of death doesn t scare me   The actual process and the pain i ll feel while dying actually scares me more   I just wish I could find joy in something other then her   I just feel so stressed about school  and concerning the future   I want to work hard to secure but it just feels so pointless to actually try cause I feel like no matter what I do I ll just be a failure
summary: A month after he started dating his girlfriend, they crashed his car. His parents found out about it and he was banned from seeing her. Now he's depressed and doesn't know what to do. He's stressed about school and the future.

text: I m so burnt out  Quarantine was the once in a lifetime break I needed  but I m an essential worker  Now work is even harder than normal and I m drained  My brain has nothing left I know  I know  I should be thankful that I m still getting a paycheck  And I am thankful when I can get my wits about me  I know I m blessed to still have my bills paid  but my mental health is declining at a rapid pace  First it was daily anxiety attacks  then it was more frequent panic attacks  Now my weekends are wholly consumed by my depression  which has come roaring back alongside daily thoughts of suicide  This is not sustainable  Not a day goes by that I don t think of offing myself  and recently  the idea of death has an allure to it like water to someone walking in the desert  I need rest  and death is the only thing that can provide that I feel like my job is a meat grinder  and that I m the meat being fed into it  It s eventually going to kill me  Either that  or after all the coronavirus stuff I ll get a new job and I ll work til I die that way  Joyous I m posting it here not because I m actually going to go through with it  but because I can t tell my friends what I m feeling  They ve all been fired or furloughed by now and have their own set of problems  they don t need to hear about mine  But I needed to get this out somewhere  so I hope here was okay
summary: Quarantine was the once in a lifetime break I needed. Now work is even harder than normal and I'm burnt out. My mental health is declining at a rapid pace. I think about suicide a lot. I feel like my job is a meat grinder and that I'm the meat being fed into it.
